question: 退屈
sourceMnemonic: I <kanji>retreat</kanji>! I <kanji>yield</kanji>! I can't take it anymore, it's so <vocabulary>boring</vocabulary>. Just imagine yourself giving up on whatever you're doing because you're so darn bored. You can't stand it. You have to retreat. You are ready to yield. Booooooring.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
